content.text: Match ends, Almería 1, Athletic Club 3.
Second Half ends, Almería 1, Athletic Club 3.
Corner,  Athletic Club. Conceded by Míchel Macedo.
Attempt missed. Corona (Almería) right footed shot from outside the box is too high from a direct free kick.
